Oasis Albums

Be Here Now (1997)

Album Statistics

  • Release Date: August 21, 1997
  • UK Chart Position: #1
  • First Week Sales: 696,000 copies
  • Total Sales: Over 8 million copies worldwide
  • Certification: 3× Platinum (UK)

Key Tracks

  • D'You Know What I Mean?
  • Stand By Me
  • All Around the World
  • Don't Go Away

Recording Details

Recorded at Abbey Road Studios and Ridge Farm Studios between October 1996 and May 1997. The album was notably recorded during the height of the band's fame and excess, with production costs estimated at over £250,000.

Standing on the Shoulder of Giants (2000)

Album Statistics

  • Release Date: February 28, 2000
  • UK Chart Position: #1
  • First Week Sales: 310,000 copies
  • Total Sales: Over 3 million copies worldwide
  • Certification: Platinum (UK)

Key Tracks

  • Go Let It Out
  • Who Feels Love?
  • Sunday Morning Call
  • Where Did It All Go Wrong?

Band Changes

The first album without founding members Paul "Bonehead" Arthurs and Paul "Guigsy" McGuigan, marking a significant change in the band's lineup and sound.
